title: FIT File: Techtember Roundup! Apple Watch, Pixel Watch, GoPro, DJI, and More!
content:
﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we chat about all the new Techtember goodies including Apple Watches, Pixel watches, GoPros, new drones, and more!.

0:00 Where have we been?
1:10 Apple AirPods 4
3:55 Shokz OpenRun Pro 2
5:15 GoPro Hero 13 Black
13:59 GoPro Hero “4K”
24:58 DJI Neo Drone
32:21 Google Pixel Watch 3
46:29 Apple Watch Ultra 2 Black
53:11 Apple Watch Series 10
1:00:29 Apple Watch Sleep Apnea

Thanks to Precision Fuel & Hydration, where you can get 15% off your first order.  Additionally, check out their free Fuel & Hydration Planner.

As a reminder, here’s where you can find the podcast:

  • The FIT File on YouTube.

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • YouTube Music
  • Spotify
  • RSS Feed

Thanks for listening!
author: Ray Maker
